body.para: There are three sub screens for fixture settings, one for each of the following settings.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:48px left,96px left,144px left,192px left,240px left,288px left,336px left,384px left,432px left,480px left,528px left,576px left ;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: Fixture Main and Auxiliary Clamp/Unclamp Sequence

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The four hydraulic lines and two external inputs (sensors) available are shared between the Fixture Clamp/Unclamp Sequence and M350/M351 Sequence as well as the Auxiliary Clamp/Unclamp Sequence.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Work Load/Unload Sequence allows configuration of the following items.

para.text: Only user who are assigned privilege to do machine configuration can use this button. Ensure to have the details of the hydraulic circuit design to make the required settings.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
